info.name: The Vault (Fallout.wikia.com) dark
info.description:
Darker, non-blinding version of the site, with a new background and some edited icons, etc.

Most of what I've done here involved the use of Firefox's Firebug add-on, as well as some trial and error.
info.additionalInfo:
Updated!
This is now on version .92

MOST RECENT ADDITIONS: Fixed background images, body background color. Should be better for Multi-monitor setups.

PREVIOUS ADDITIONS: Fixed Recipe blocks
Wiki bar made transparent, floating popup config link no longer floating, various objects made to have a black or very dark grey background. Easier to read some text.

Fixed the portal pages, as they ended up blindingly white/light yellow grayish. Fixed now, much better.
Background images changed, various boxes and comments, links, Nukapedia bottlecap image has been adjusted on Firefox and Chrome.
I like the Chrome version of the bottlecap image best, but Firefox looks reasonably good as well, and unfortunately there's not much I can do to get the Firefox version looking better.
____________________________________
You have full permission to do whatever you like with it, as long as you credit me for the time I put in.

I'll try and keep it updated with the site. Please tell me if there are any issues you have with it, or if you are suddenly blinded, and be sure to leave a url to/description of the part of the site you're having the issues with.

PLANS: Still to replace Fallout Bottle cap logo with a cleaner, darker version, with light borders, and easy to read words. It's just too difficult to make out what it says, for my taste.
